title: Wolf

properties.name: description
properties.value: Wolves are canine monsters that can be found in various places around RuneScape. They have a variety of different combat levels, level 64 wolves being the most common, and level 11 and 14 wolves only being found in the Stronghold of Security.

This article is about standard grey wolves. For white wolves, see White wolf. For other wolves, see Wolf (disambiguation).
 This article has a Slayer task guide here.
Information comparing locations for Slayer tasks will be on this page

Wolves are canine monsters that can be found in various places around RuneScape. They have a variety of different combat levels, level 64 wolves being the most common, and level 11 and 14 wolves only being found in the Stronghold of Security.

Their bones can be used with a chisel to create wolfbone arrowtips used to make ogre arrows, which are necessary for completing Big Chompy Bird Hunting and Freeing Skrach Uglogwee during Recipe for Disaster.

Contents

  • 1 Locations
  • 2 Drops
    • 2.1 100%
    • 2.2 Tertiary
  • 3 Changes
    • 3.1 Gallery (historical)
  • 4 Trivia

Drops[edit | edit source]

The following drop rates are provided by Jagex, unless otherwise specified.

100%[edit | edit source]

Item Quantity Rarity Price High Alch
Wolf bones(m)1Always6430
Bones(f)1Always620

Tertiary[edit | edit source]

Item Quantity Rarity Price High Alch
Wolf bone(m)11/4[d 1]Not soldN/A
Looting bag(m)11/6[d 2]Not soldN/A
Clue scroll (beginner)1Rare[d 3]Not sold12
  1. ^ Wolf bones are only dropped during Rag and Bone Man II, and only by level 64 wolves.
  2. ^ Looting bags are only dropped by those found in the Wilderness.
  3. ^ Clue scrolls are only dropped by the wolves in the Stronghold of Security.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
26 January ‚Äì
27 June 2005

The level 64 wolf's examine was changed from "Not mans'[sic] best friend." to "Not man's best friend."

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • Three additional variants of the Level 25 Wolves were added in June 2007; however, these currently cannot be found anywhere ingame.
